website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for a contemporary, large-capacity washer, but there may be a possibility of operational flaws.
pros: Packed with lots of features, including nine wash cycles and steam treat function that tackles tough stains
Has modern looks and is fairly quiet to operate
cons: Some units displayed error codes for no obvious reason
Leaks from the door have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Really like it. If we wash comforters it jumps around ...
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 30 months. Really like it. If we wash comforters it jumps around a little bit but most the time it works great.
customer_reviews.author: kirk wagner

customer_reviews.title: My washer leaks from the back. Every attempt to ...
customer_reviews.text: My washer leaks from the back. Every attempt to get in touch with Kenmore/Sears has proved abortive despite buying the three-year warranty nonsense. I regret buying this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome washer!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to say, this washer is great! It has a lot of special features and the accela wash is the best! Our clothes come out very clean and they spin out practically dry! I thought i loved my old top load washer when it finally bit the dust after 10 years, but it seems terrible compared to this washer! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience!
customer_reviews.text: On time- had 2 people deliver & haul away the old washer, was fast & efficient-took about 15-20 minutes, unboxed the new washer-called me 30 minutes before- carried it up 14 stairs-were friendly- hooked the new lines up & tested. Was $200 cheaper than a similar brand Couldn’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: It was a real gamble ordering a washing machine online, but Amazon came through again. This is a great washer. I've only had it 1 week now but clothes smell fresh, they're really clean, washes are quicker and there are more choices for precision washing. The larger capacity is terrific. Can't say enough. There were good reviews on this site that helped me make my choice so I'm adding another hoping it will help someone else. I got extended financing which helped too. The delivery team was professional and congenial and they had to take it into the basement, which wasn't easy. It arrived right on time and the install was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: jengi86

customer_reviews.title: Great Washer
customer_reviews.text: The installation was a breeze and the washer has worked perfectly since setup for all basic wash requirements. I have not experimented with all of the wash options but everything tried so far has worked as it should. There was a terrible smell from the washer after it was first installed for the first month or so but it did go away and this is apparently a common issue with a lot of new washers.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: With accelawash it washes clothes almost 3 times as fast as my old front loader! Love all of the options and the "trick" to get it to spin-only, though I haven't needed that!
customer_reviews.author: Bar-K

customer_reviews.title: Clothes come out clean, but their still wet! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Great washer. When our top load washer died, I found this. Been using it a couple months now. Fair warning; HE washers can, and will get kinda stinky. You have to wash the washer to clean it all out, and make the laundry smell fresh again. They sell special detergents for just such a thing, but this washer has a little tray you slide out, fill with regular household bleach, then set the machine to auto clean. (I don't think youd want to leave any clothes in the washer while it's running its auto clean cycle) But, no special trip to the store required. Would buy again, and wouldn't hesitate to reccomend this washer to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Slappy's Childcare Clinic

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS TO HIGH HEAVEN.
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues with the smell, leave the door open after using, vinegar, the affresh cleaning cycle. The clothes smell musty. The washer smells musty. Spent a $1000 plus $200 for the extended warranty. Totally disappointed. Would go back to the old fashion top loader next time. It also some how gets off balance occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLucky

customer_reviews.title: Great washer but not app compatible
customer_reviews.text: It is a great front loading washer. The only thing I dont like about it is the app isnt compatible with this model although the website misleads you to believe you are buying the machine that will alert your phone when its done... not so. The best thing I like is it washes fast and really washes! I can do a good clean load in 20 mintues.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love my first front loader
customer_reviews.text: I've had this washer for a couple of months and I could not love it more! It is mildly inconvenient that I have to open the door and leave it open when my laundry is done but other than that it is perfect for me. I wash heavy blankts every week to keep my dog's fur off of everything and this machine takes it like a champ! Quilts make it hop a little but king size plush blankets, sheets, and down comforters do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well overall, good controls and cycles, fast wash. But very noisy in a rattle bangy sort of way going into and coming out of spin cycle. Quiets when up to full speed. Don't know if this is normal. Washer was delivered and professionally installed by Amazon's own contractor, and I checked that the 4 transport bolts on the back had been removed.
customer_reviews.author: JVCW

customer_reviews.title: but does a great job of cleaning dog and cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Very slow wash cycles, but does a great job of cleaning dog and cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Lovliest washer ever 💟
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my new washer....when i do my laundry ...i tell my husband I'm going to play ❤
customer_reviews.author: Sara k. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year and a half ago on deal of the day for $769.00. Great washer and no issues since the purchase. Couldn't be happier with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: Washer is staining my clothes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd kenmore elite 796. The 1st was replaced after only 3 years of use due to brown, greasy stains on my clothes. They replaced it because the rear bearing had gone bad. I've had the new one since Aug 18 (less than 2 years) and it's doing the same thing! I've been on hold with Kenmore for over 50 minutes so far. Very difficult to get it fixed or replaced. Would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with performance and low sound level.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the washer almost a year ago. Easy to understand and works great. Not silent, but it is also not noisy. Would recommend if you need a washer with a larger load size, affordable, easy to understand, and low noise level.
customer_reviews.author: maikha

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and installation service
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivery and installation was great! I was hesitant about getting a large appliance but it was awesome. This washer is pretty good, the washing menu options are perfect, specially the quick wash in 15 minutes is useful when you need to wash something in a rush.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast professional delivery. Machine has been working like a champ nonstop...no bouncing, no noise, nothing but smooth operation and clean clothes!
customer_reviews.author: XKR

customer_reviews.title: Solid appliance with many feature settings.  Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: A large-capacity front loader with all the bells and whistles we'll ever need. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: JoRod

customer_reviews.title: Worth.
customer_reviews.text: Can do a quick load in 15 mins. Does a great job. I don’t use any apps or anything.
customer_reviews.author: IBoughtStuff

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Only wish is that I could do a second spin cycle. Door does not stand slightly open as my old one did. May be just a quirk of this particular unit. Does wash well and quick. I am certain it has more capabilities that I haven't even touched on yet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, the delivery perfect and they even set up the washer. Would definitely recommend checking out for your next purchase of a major appliance...which I didn't even realize was available through Amazon until I looked!
customer_reviews.author: Keg

customer_reviews.title: I love my new washer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new washer. The features (steam, front loading, and available wash cycles) are what makes it for me.
customer_reviews.author: John E Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2018 and its already broken. The whole Drum came off.
customer_reviews.author: fabtin

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great functions. Installed the new one and took away the old one at no extra cost. The "sanitize" function is a game changer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and easy to use.Great delivery and install.very smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Delivery & installation was easy with Amazon. Seems to work well. I have a Kenmore dryer and it stacked nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful washer!
customer_reviews.text: Super-easy to use. What a difference compared to our 12 year-old washer! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Love this washer
customer_reviews.text: Love this washer. Only problem is that the basket conceals small items such as wash cloths on the blades. Must remember to spin the basket to assure all items are removed, otherwise an item left in the washer by accident causes a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: mary ellen vinyard

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and dependable vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and setup as advertised. Old washer taken away as advertised. Setup up crew went through features and installation review. Washer is great. Large loads handled well with several options available. Recommend this washer and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: every aspect of this purchase was fantastic! Washer was delivered on-time
customer_reviews.text: From placing the order, to delivery, every aspect of this purchase was fantastic ! Washer was delivered on-time, placed into service by the delivery crew. They were courteous and efficient. They took the old washer with them, which made me really happy. I used the new washer the rest of the day, catching up on laundry that piled up due to the old machine quitting. The Kenmore washer did not disappoint ! It is quiet, efficient, and when the clothes come out, the are nearly dry ! I can only hope that this machine lasts more than the 10 years I got out of the Maytag ! Thanks Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN DRISCOLL

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time and professional It is a very nice Washing Machine Big, Quiet and very efficient Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jance

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Washing Machine
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our washing machine. It has more different settings to choose from than we will ever use. The owners manual seems complete and does a nice job of explaining what to expect from each setting. We were also very happy with the delivery and installation of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great delivery experience
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, great delivery experience. Team was respectful of my home, setup was professional, even testing the hot and cold water to be sure. Love the options especially the steam clean.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Comer

customer_reviews.title: The steam function is awesome. And so quiet
customer_reviews.text: So many options. The steam function is awesome. And so quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Altrui

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Clothes are spun so hard, even on delicate that they come out so wrinkled, you will have a hard time ironing the wrinkles out! Iam so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's super quiet, very efficient and thoroughly cleans clothes with ...
customer_reviews.text: This washer replaces a 10-12yr-old (still debating) Kenmore washer. It's super quiet, very efficient and thoroughly cleans clothes with tough stains. We strongly recommend this washer.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Delivery great, washer so far so good
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was great, the team communicated well and were on time. The washer so well seems to be doing a great job! I may post later after months of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura's books

customer_reviews.title: So much bigger than my old washer and works just like it should👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So much bigger than my old washer and works just like it should👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: jay adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's new. It works. Ask me for a review in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Product Description is FALSE
customer_reviews.text: Half of the product description on this page touts this washer's ability to be worked from the phone app. But after I ordered and it was delivered, it turns out that there's no such functionality on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costava

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the washer. Disappointed the gas dryer is not available in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine! Fabulous delivery and setup! Love my kenmore. Great quality. Top on Consumer Reports
customer_reviews.author: Lynda A Scott

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it. The price dropped by $250 less than ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. The price dropped by $250 less than 48 hrs after purchasing and Amazon wouldn't match the price. I had to cancel the first one and then reorder it. I will make an update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: NancyJ

customer_reviews.title: ... a little over a month and so far so good. I love that it has an interior light
customer_reviews.text: I've had this washer for a little over a month and so far so good. I love that it has an interior light. The delivery was timely, and the men were in and out in no time and hauled my old one away.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

product_meta.title: Kenmore 41072 White Cubic Feet Steam Treat, Accela Wash Elite 5.2 cu. ft. Front Load Washer
product_meta.description:
The Kenmore Elite 5.2 Cubic Foot Front-Load Washer is designed to tackle your toughest loads. Take on large loads of clothing, bulky sheets and towels, and even oversized comforters and bedding.

This tough washing machine features Steam Treat, which helps eliminate the need to pre-treat stains. It uses steam for a deep clean to tackle common stains. If you have little ones, the Kids Wear Cycle will be your new best friend. Optional cycle scrubs set-in stains and runs the load through second rinse cycle to ensure clothes are clean and clear of dirt, detergents, and tough stains. No more pre-treating, scrubbing, or overnight soaking to get your clothes looking like new again.

Features Smart Motion Technology to get your clothes clean while still treating fabrics with the care they need. This advanced technology blends up to 6 wash motions for customized care of every fabric type. Give your clothes some TLC with 9 custom cycles, 5 soil levels, 5 water temperatures, and 5 spin speed options. The NSF-certified Sanitize cycle kills up to 99.9% of certain household germs and bacteria, perfect for cleaning a load of cloth diapers or soiled work clothes. With Accela Wash, the washer can get more loads done faster. It reduces soak, wash, and rinse times without sacrificing cleaning quality. The Active Spray and Active Rinse nozzles work together to speed up laundry time.

Also features a quiet Direct Drive motor and an easy-to-use LED touch-button control for a more responsive and quieter washing machine. Matching dryer can be purchased separately to complete the set. The matching dryer model is the Kenmore Elite Front-Load Dryer 81962 or Gas Dryer 91262.

Kenmore recommends measuring your space to ensure the front-loading washer will fit. Washing machine should be installed on a flat surface for best results. Kenmore does not recommend placing washer on casters due to the washer's weight.

DIMENSIONS: 33.9" L x 29" W x 40.8" H
WASHER CAPACITY: 5.2 cubic feet 
COLOR: White.
feature_bullets: FRONT-LOADING WASHER: 5.2 cubic feet front-load washer is designed to handle loads of towels, hampers of laundry and huge comforters. Direct Drive quiet motor and LED touch-button control panel
CUSTOMIZED CLEANING: Smart Motion Technology blends 6 wash motions for customized care. Features 9 custom cycles, 5 soil levels, 5 water temperatures and 5 spin speed options
TOUGH AGAINST STAINS: Steam Treat option takes care of stains with steam power. Kids Wear Cycle scrubs stains and runs a second rinse cycle to ensure clothes are free of dirt and detergents
WASH IN LESS TIME: Accela Wash reduces soak, wash, and rinse times without sacrificing cleaning quality. Active Spray and Active Rinse nozzles work together to speed up laundry time
DIMENSIONS: 33.9" L x 29" W x 40.8" H Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit
